I would like to like this game. I really would. But I just can't.

The game isn't friendly to new players. A majority of my hours in this game come from playing against bots, so when I try to play any of the multiplayer modes, I'm not that good. Usually, in other games, that wouldn't be much of a problem. But, for some reason, in this game, lots of people hate you for being new.

I've literally been kicked just by being left in a 1v2 clutch scenario. People were complaining about me in the chat. That's just not a fun experience.

And that's not just in casual. That's applied to competitive too. So that's about 95% of the game that I can't enjoy (The other 4% and 1% being community servers and playing against bots, respectively). 

I don't mind being bad at a game. I understand everyone starts somewhere. But if I'm being kicked JUST for being new? That's something I do mind.
